channel.title: Duel Arena bug
channel.description:
Okay once the duel is over and when you us dds++ you still get poison out and then the spec is not all the way up once the fight is over to can someone help me on this bug?
This is PI/Shards

item.title: Duel Arena bug
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

So you’re saying that IF during the duel you were poisoned, you would keep the poison affect after the duel is finished. And you’re also saying that the special attack does not regenerate when the duel is over.

If so just remove the poison by finding the way that anti poison works in the server and put it when the game registers a finished duel. Also when the duel is finished add a method or set special attack to 100.

Read full topic
